spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout is loosely similar (dining left, kitchen top, living right, bedroom bottom-left), but key plan-defined spaces and openings do not match. Wash Area + Toilet are not represented as two distinct rooms (merged/altered). Entrance/stair zone at bottom-right does not match the plan’s stair footprint/location. Multiple plan windows are missing or relocated (living and bedroom especially). Room proportions/corridor widths are notably altered versus the 2D plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Interior partitions do not preserve the plan’s defined subdivision (Wash Area vs Toilet). Adjacencies deviate around the central wet-area core and the stair/entry region. Doors are largely absent/not embedded as per plan (no clear swing/orientation). An extra/altered entry volume with steps appears, while the plan’s stair run/landing is not faithfully modeled.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture types are present (dining set, sofa set, bed, kitchen cabinetry) and roughly placed in expected rooms, but exact mapping is unreliable due to altered room boundaries (wet-area core and entry/stair region). Scale appears generally consistent, though some circulation clearances differ from the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric-style presentation with coherent lighting and readable composition. Geometry is mostly clean with consistent materials. However, the view is more perspective/isometric than strict orthographic, and some architectural elements (openings/doors/windows) are simplified/omitted, reducing clarity for verification.

detected_errors.description: Missing distinct Wash Area room (plan shows Wash Area separate from Toilet; render shows a single combined/ambiguous wet room).
Missing distinct Toilet room subdivision (separate compartment not modeled as per plan).
Stair/UP area placement and footprint do not match the plan; render shows a small entry with steps rather than the plan’s stair run/landing geometry at bottom-right.
Missing/unclear internal doors and door swing orientations (plan-defined door positions for Bedroom/Wash/Toilet and main entrance are not faithfully represented).
Main entrance opening/door placement is inconsistent with the plan’s 'Entrance to the House' location and configuration.
Missing living room window(s) shown on the plan’s exterior wall (rendered living room lacks the corresponding exterior window placement).
Missing bedroom exterior window(s) indicated on the plan (rendered bedroom shows no clear exterior window where expected).
Kitchen window placement appears inconsistent (render shows a window on a different wall/position than implied by the plan).
Proportion distortion in central circulation/wet-core: corridor and partition lengths do not preserve the plan’s relative dimensions (wet core appears compressed/reshaped).
Hallucinated/altered entry volume: an additional enclosed corner/vestibule-like mass at bottom-right is shown that does not correspond cleanly to a labeled room in the 2D plan.
